Reviews.Title: <3 Windows Phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I've had my original HD7S for about a year. This is the first phone that I have purchased that I'm not already eager about getting a "new" phone. I've used every phone OS available on the market to date and the Windows Phone is by far the best phone OS available. The only issue I had with this purchase was that the battery (which was NEW and SEALED) was defective and kept rebooting the phone. I had a backup battery and put that in the phone which fixed the problem. I would like to get a fresh new battery with the phone but it's really not worth the shipping costs to ship a battery.Overall, great device - and for all you n00bs out there, if you don't have AT&T; your device would be an HTC HD7 - NOT - the HTC HD7S that way you don't run into your SIM card issues. This phone came with all the AT&T; markings and programs on it, also.Enjoy a device that comes with all the capabilities that a phone should (standard) without having to upgrade every year for a new feature...*cough*iPhone*cough*

Reviews.Title: Love it & Hate it....... HTC HD7
Reviews.Author: Cravebigger
Reviews.Content: Don't get me wrong for this price the phone is great but I think is best you know what your getting not just whats on the surface but inside.-It is true about the noises you hear when your on the phone chatting.-I had this phone for no more than a week & a half and almost every time i listens to music it freezes after a while. No returning unless you turn it off that SUCKS!!!!!-Normally i don't do review but i had to after finding out that every time someone send me a picture message it can never come through YEP most likely you wont be about to send or get pictures..... don't believe me look it up yourself.Am keeping it only because I spend my money i don't like shipping back and all that drama but plz know what your buying I hope this help you. AND DON'T GET ME WRONG HTC HD7 IS A BEAUTIFUL PHONE JUST PROBLEMS THAT KILLS THE WHOLE EXPERIENCE

Reviews.Title: This is an OK phone worth no more than $140.
Reviews.Author: E.Denisse "erikaDenisse(:"
Reviews.Content: I bought mine for close to $180 and ended up selling it. The 16gb is great. It did come unlocked. However, just letting you know, this phone is OLD. It does not matter WHO you buy it from, the phone will not COME NEW! It will never come sealed anymore. I bought my new and it came "new" but without the earphones that come with all phones and everything in the box was a mess. Also, HTC takes FOREVER to push their updates. This phone doesn't have Windows 7.5 yet! Many phones already do.In brief: This phone is outdated, Windows 7 OS is boring although cute/attractive, the phone is not very customizable, it's intuitive but not fun, and VERY limited apps... I wasn't happy and don't recommend Windows Phone 7. :( Bought a Galaxy S3 instead! :)

Reviews.Title: A very good phone.
Reviews.Author: Jacob Farmer "Yeah, Its me..."
Reviews.Content: A lot of bang for the buck.  I have had mine for about 2 years now.  I have really enjoyed the phone and can give a strong critique of the pros and cons that others don't usually cover.Pros:The battery is an easy $5 replacement.Cases and protectors are still cheap and plentiful to order.The wider screen (compared to Nokias) works and looks great with the Windows GUI.Very solid operating system with few hangups.Will update to Windows 7.5 officially ( 7.8 unofficially..I am running 7.8 and it is worth the effort!)It is compatible with Family Mobile if unlockedDecent camera, but no auto stabilizer..Cons:The music player can freeze and I have read that this is actually a Zune issue not doing well with different audio formats.  Stick to  MP3's and no problems. It is the only thing that has ever made the phone freeze.No stabilizer for camera.Bright flash/flashlight.Audio could be louder, but it is okay.Does not offer hotspot function.Will not send photos through bluetooth. (its an HTC thing)If the cons do not bother you that much it is a worthy purchase.  I am still enjoying mine and considering that a Galaxy 3,4 and an HTC One still cost hundreds more it is a great deal. Also just a note here. The black column on the right side is eliminated with the OS updates and the icons take up the full screen(looks better).

Reviews.Title: htc
Reviews.Author: naa mills
Reviews.Content: i cannot connect my phone to the internet am always getting no result every time i try to connect htc Apps i called my network support but they could not help. I always have to use a bluetooth when am talking on the phone because there is loud noise in the phone when you use without a bluetooth and is very irritating i regret buying the phone because is not working for me.

Reviews.Title: Very good for the price!
Reviews.Author: Ivane Narimanidze
Reviews.Content: Quite a nice piece of hardware for the price. Plus it is unlocked and works with every carries as long as the frequencies are support. Recommended!

Reviews.Title: Unlocked Phone with Windows 7 OS
Reviews.Author: LangTu
Reviews.Content: HTC HD7 S T9295 is as described and fast shipping.Item is brand new and unlocked. This Phone with windows 7 OS cannot  install Skype,viber App.. (only work with windows 7.5).Any way this phone is very good.

Reviews.Title: This the the 2nd HTC I've owned in a 3 years spam...
Reviews.Author: Mauricio De Menezes
Reviews.Content: Bought in USA and using it in Canada, just bought a SIM card and bingo! I works flawlessly  and as expected. My first HTC lasted nearly 3 years without any problem so I decided to stick with the same brand. I read bad reviews and comments on the internet which really don't make any sense at all considering my own experience. Great price, great size, great phone...great buy!

Reviews.Title: Whatsapp Cannot be intsalled
Reviews.Author: Louis Jeune Jerry Sleevens
Reviews.Content: I've been screwed... Before to buy this Item I asked if I would be able to use whatsapp on it... but it seems like whatsapp have been removed from the market place on windows 7.5. The seller lied to me...If I knew I would never buy this phone! Still waiting for windows for an update that will allow me to install whatsapp on the phone

Reviews.Title: i like the cellphone
Reviews.Author: niuskary
Reviews.Content: everything is okey with the cellphone, im just desappointed because whatsapp can not donwloaded to the cellphone... But its a goog cellphone

Reviews.Title: Phone lasted exactly 2 months
Reviews.Author: GWilson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone on March 12, 2014 from Tronic Spot.  The phone had issues with the proximity sensor from the start. The phone would make whistling noises and constantly reboot for no apparent reason.  Yesterday (May 12th),  the phone stopped reading the Sim card and now it won't boot pass the HTC screen.  If or when it does it says emergency calls only and reboots. The phone was not dropped or exposed to any liquids of any kind.  It simply just stopped working 60 days after I placed my order.  This phone has been a lot of aggravation and a complete waste of money.  I would not buy this HTC model again or make any future purchases from Tronic Spot.

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: albert coleman
Reviews.Content: cant download certain applications and it doesnt pickup the signal sometimes wouldnt recomend buying this phone i wasted my money

Reviews.Title: Thank you!
Reviews.Author: Wendy J Plante
Reviews.Content: I am loving my new smartphone. It's  working like a charm. I highly recommend both the item and the seller.

Reviews.Title: NO TETHERING FEATURE ON ATT HTC HD7
Reviews.Author: Bee Girl
Reviews.Content: The whole reason I bought this phone is because I an familiar with it having owned one through T-Mobile.  Well when it broke I decided to order another one.. the phone came unlocked but I cant tether because there is no option to. I use My I-pad on the go and I like to use my cell unlimited data through straight talk to operate my I-pad.... Im very disappointed .......

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: davis timothy
Reviews.Content: very good phone i got what i wanted and i will  recommend it to all my friends. thank you so much

Reviews.Title: It's Okay
Reviews.Author: pooh
Reviews.Content: This phone is Good,the reason I rate it as OK,is because,the WP7 is a headache when trying to download apps from my region.If this phone was a 7.5 or 8..it will have been rated a full 5 star. I ordered  two more HTC with 7.5 and it works great.

Reviews.Title: HTC Windows phone GSm if it has apps
Reviews.Author: sharon
Reviews.Content: This phone HTC Windows phone GSm it has apps how can I find the apps what section on the phone should I go on

Reviews.Title: bad phone ever
Reviews.Author: Derima Ibsen
Reviews.Content: I can even download any apps even watch youtube video it always send you to the market place to purchase stuff when you ge there it shows nothing its the worst phone I ever have thanks htc for that phone.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Wensky
Reviews.Content: I like the features on this phone and it is a nice phone too. I recommend this phone to anyone who needs a good and nice phone

Reviews.Title: think twice  before buying this product
Reviews.Author: Omer Ibrahim
Reviews.Content: Limited options to control its features, whenever you trying something bing pop up on your face veryfrequently.Limited options to control the features and limited options on the settingsvery hard to control it , if you connect to wifi and not using it for few mins it immediately goes offlineonce you starting using it , you feel very much trappedI will definitely return back if I can get a refund

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: The phone comes very quick., looks like new. The box and the menu are not origenal, I need to down load the "zune" first, and update the programs. I use it for T-moblie, it is good, but I don't know why it can not send and receive picture massages, and this is the reason I only rate it 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: Unlocked and good as new
Reviews.Author: Chigs Uzoigwe
Reviews.Content: Transitioning to this phone with my sim card was fast, smooth, and no issues. The connection setup app should be installed using HTC apps for easy configurations depending on the network carrier. It's a good 3G phone.

Reviews.Title: A good piece of kit.
Reviews.Author: Billy
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what I wanted and needed.  It is very functional and until India is covered by 4G it fits exactly into my requirements.  The device is mobile and I am able to have entertainment whilst I am commuting, the fact that I can also communicate is an added bonus!  Still working my way round the various apps and finding out the various functionality.

Reviews.Title: Just great
Reviews.Author: Matheus Soares da Silva Ferreira
Reviews.Content: The phone is amazing offers me everything I need for a cheap price. The battery does not last too much when WiFi is on, but overall is a good phone.

Reviews.Title: OK for the present..........
Reviews.Author: tgamb
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as an interim phone to use until I decide exactly what I want in a cell phone.  This works pretty well for internet, messaging and e-mail, and I hadn't experienced the convenience of a mobile platform for anything other than cell calls and messaging.  The touch screen is kind of quirky and doesn't always do what I intend, but I assume that is more my problem than the phone.  It's heavier than I thought it would be.  If you purchase this phone and update it to OS 7.5, you will have to load Zune software to do so.  The screen is excellent for viewing videos, very clear and exact.  The only thing I haven't been able to do is send or receive text messages with pictures, which I could do with my previous phone.  Until I upgraded the operating system, the addition of "apps" was pretty much null and void, but once that was done, that process has worked without problem.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: My wife got it for me as a Christmas gift to replace one that was acting up.I am so pleased with the performance. Having the use of windows with me while I amout and about is great. I also use it when I go for walks to listen to my favorite muisic, or radio station.

Reviews.Title: HTC HD7
Reviews.Author: María Cecilia Miles
Reviews.Content: I received it in the days agreed, in excellent condition. I love the product. totally recommended  and a very good price

Reviews.Title: feed back
Reviews.Author: stickybun
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy the phone the only down side to it is the terrible feed back ringing noise during calls. Its as if the phone is missing the ground in it or something to that effect else wise it worms great...

Reviews.Title: I love it but.
Reviews.Author: Leon W.
Reviews.Content: I kinda got it wet and there was water inside the phone and now I think it won't work anymore. that or the battery :P

Reviews.Title: I say get the HD7 unlocked instead.
Reviews.Author: J. Reyes
Reviews.Content: It's a great phone, but AT&T; phones apparently can't update or something, I don't know.I've had so many problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Chanandler
Reviews.Content: I have attempted to buy this item twice now each time after I buy it I check the following day after i'm done with my duties on base and only be annoyed to see that they have removed it from my list after I bought it and raised the price, originally I believe the phone was about 170 now its 230. All this seller wants to do is work you over, don't buy from him I just ended up going through somebody else for this phone.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone will work on GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported.
3G-enabled Windows Phone 7 smartphone with extra-large 4.3-inch touchscreen for fast typing on virtual keyboard and excellent multimedia
Windows Phone 7 OS provides easy access to social networking, personal/corporate e-mail, office apps, Xbox LIVE games, streaming media, and more
5-megapixel camera with HD 720p video capture; 16 GB internal memory; Wireless-N Wi-Fi; Bluetooth stereo music; GPS for navigation and location services
Up to 4.5 hours of talk time, up to 276 hours (11.5 days) of standby time; released in June, 2011
ProductInfo.Name: HTC HD7 S T9295 Unlocked GSM Phone with 16GB, Windows 7 OS, Dolby Mobile & SRS Sound Enhancement, 5MP Camera, GPS, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and FM Radio - Black
